          <title>
            <string language="en">Multiple reflection</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mehrfache Reflexion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réflexion multiple</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reflexão múltipla</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Riflessione multipla</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πολλαπλάσια αντανάκλαση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reflexión múltiple</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows two plane mirrors to be used in a multiple reflection demonstration with a ray box.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">angle of reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mirror</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">multiple reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ray box</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt zwei flache in einer 
mehrfachen Reflexion Demonstration mit einem Strahlkasten verwendet zu
werden Spiegel.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre deux miroirs plats à 
utiliser dans une démonstration multiple de réflexion avec un cadre 
de rayon.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra dois espelhos planos a ser 
usados em uma demonstração múltipla da reflexão com uma caixa do 
raio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra due specchi piani da usare 
in una dimostrazione multipla di riflessione con una casella del 
raggio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει δύο καθρέφτες αεροπλάνων
για να χρησιμοποιηθεί σε μια πολλαπλάσια επίδειξη αντανάκλασης με 
ένα κιβώτιο ακτίνων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra dos espejos planos que se 
utilizarán en una demostración múltiple de la reflexión con un 
rectángulo del rayo.</string>
          </description>
